name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO Website Scanner: Meta Info, Headings, Word Count, etc.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans a site for basic SEO meta information and headings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your SEO Performance Effortlessly

SEO Website Scanner is your all-in-one tool for quick and comprehensive website analysis. Designed specifically for SEO enthusiasts, digital marketers, and content creators, this extension provides essential insights to enhance your website's SEO performance right from your browser.

KEY FEATURES:

1. Meta Information at a Glance:
   - Meta Title: View and analyze your page’s title along with character count.
   - Meta Description: Check your meta description with an instant character count.
   - URL: Easily access and verify your page’s URL.
   - Canonical URL: Ensure your canonical URL is set correctly.
   - Robots Tags: Check your robots meta tags for better indexing control.

2. Content Analysis:
   - Word Count: Quickly see the total word count of your page’s content.
   - Heading Tags Overview: Get a detailed count of all heading tags (H1 to H6) on your page.

3. Detailed Headings Structure:
   - Hierarchical View: Understand the structure and hierarchy of your heading tags to improve content organization and SEO.

4. Media Insights:
   - Images Count: Know the number of images on your page for better media optimization.
   - Links Count: Get the total number of links to improve internal linking strategies.

WHY CHOOSE SEO Website Scanner?

- User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design makes it easy for anyone to use, regardless of technical skill.
- Instant Results: Get all the SEO data you need with a single click.
- Improve Your SEO Strategy: Use detailed insights to refine your content, improve your website’s structure, and boost your search engine rankings.

HOW TO USE:

1. Install the Extension: Add SEO Website Scanner to your Chrome browser.
2. Navigate to Any Web Page: Go to the page you want to analyze.
3. Click the SEO Website Scanner Icon: Get instant access to detailed SEO insights.
4. Switch Between Tabs: Use the tab buttons to view basic meta information or a detailed headings structure.

Visit Us:
For more tools and SEO resources, visit No Frills Plugins

Enhance your SEO efforts with SEO Website Scanner – the simplest way to get the SEO data you need, right when you need it. Install now and take your website’s performance to the next level!
